mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_chat(chat_room_id, user_id, context, view_at,created_at) values (#{chatRoomId},#{userId},#{context},#{viewAt},now());
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_chat SET context = #{context}, view_at = #{viewAt} WHERE chat_id = #{chatId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.chat_room_id, a.user_id, b.username, a.context as message, FROM tb_chat a LEFT JOIN tb_user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId};
